newsitem.title: USA: Allstate to sell reinsurance operation.
newsitem.headline: Allstate to sell reinsurance operation.

text.p: Allstate Insurance Co said Thurday it had reached an agreement in principle to sell its London-based reinsurance operation, Allstate Reinsurance Co Ltd, to QBE Insurance Group Ltd of Sydney, Australia.
Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
Allstate Reinsurance is indirectly owned by Allstate Insurance. It reinsures risks mainly in the United Kingdom, Europe, the Middle East and the Far East.
Allstate did not say when it expected the deal to close.
The transaction, which was first announced in September, is scheduled to close in the fourth quarter, Allstate President Edward Liddy said in an interview on Thursday.
